entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow. High zero. Forecast issued 2:16 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to periods of light snow overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 2:16 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:16 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
